title: Movie On Cristiano Ronaldo By The Makers Of Senna, Releasing In November
text:
Movie On Cristiano Ronaldo By The Makers Of Senna, Releasing In November Written by: Chaitra K Updated: Friday, October 16, 2015, 12:17 [IST] 
The makers of biographical movies Senna, a documentary film on the life and death of the Brazilian motor-racing champion Ayrton Senna that was released in 2010, have scheduled to release their next movie on the legendary Footballer Cristiano Ronaldo this November. 
The movie is named after the Real Madrid player and is subtitled as, 'A Year in the Life of the World's Best Footballer'. 
It is said to be a big budget movie releasing under Universal Studios, that's going to give his fans the opportunity to know better about his life from the start. 
The movie is believed to showcase his life in depth, which includes, the sacrifices he's made to rise to be what he is today, his rise to fame and most important part of his life, his family. 
The 30 years old Portuguese Professional Footballer has been actively promoting himself on the social networking sites prior to the release of the movie. 
He's been posting pictures of himself posing before private jets, in the swanky Madrid restaurants and his gazillion dollar apartments as means to promote the movie. 
Apart from his pictures, the footballer also posted the poster of the movie 'Ronaldo' and captioned it as, "So excited. Here's the poster for my official documentary in cinemas soon. What do you think? " 
Image Courtesy: Instagram 
He also seems to be using his son to help him promote the movie. He posted a picture of his son looking through the camera lens. His little sons aspires to be a goal keeper, though father doesn't seem too happy about that! 
Image Courtesy: Instagram 
The movie makers and television shows have always been keen on knowing more about these Football champions. One such Footballer was Wayne Rooney who was interviewed by Gary Lineker at his home for the BBC. 
Rooney's interview was screened on the television 9 years ago and he was known regionally. Ronaldo is rising to fame in Hollywood and globally through the movies. 
Other than all the rivalry, competition, spirit of winning and losing and all the technicalities of the game, the football fans can also look forward to witness the other side of their champion, Ronaldo's life in the movie 'Ronaldo' that's hitting the screens on the 9th of November this year. 
Behold Ronaldo's fans, there's more to come soon!
